typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(8,2),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as timestamp,
		SellEndDate as timestamp,
		DiscontinuedDate as timestamp,
		ThumbNailPhoto as binary,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> ProductAbfs
source(output(
		ProductId as integer,
		Hash as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ProductDw
ProductAbfs select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		ProductName = Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimColumns
SelectDimColumns derive(Hash = sha2(256,ProductName,ProductNumber,Color,StandardCost,ListPrice,Size)) ~> DerHash
ProductDw select(mapColumn(
		dw_ProductId = ProductId,
		dw_Hash = Hash,
		dw_ProductNumber = ProductNumber,
		dw_ProductName = ProductName,
		dw_Color = Color,
		dw_StandardCost = StandardCost,
		dw_ListPrice = ListPrice,
		dw_Size = Size
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDwColumns
DerHash, SelectDwColumns join(ProductID == dw_ProductId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(Hash != dw_Hash) ~> FilterPerimetre
FilterPerimetre alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ProductId as integer,
		Hash as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		ProductName as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(19,4),
		ListPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Size as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductId = ProductID,
		Hash,
		ProductNumber,
		ProductName,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DestDimProduct
